thread.title: Get 12 packs of Huggies baby wipes for FREE - including delivery - at Mothercare
thread.title_full: Get 12 packs of Huggies baby wipes for FREE - including delivery - at Mothercare - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Get 12 packs of Huggies baby wipes for FREE - including delivery - at Mothercare
text:
Get 12 packs of Huggies baby wipes for FREE - including delivery - at Mothercare You can never have too many wipes! Pick up 12 free packs of the Huggies kind with this Mothercare cashback offer Share Comments By Molly Holt 11:26, 8 FEB 2017 Updated 12:58, 8 FEB 2017 Money 12 packs of Huggies wet wipes delivered to your door - for absolutely nothing (Photo: Getty) money Raising a child is made up of many unpredictable milestones, but one thing is certain: you'll always need lots and lots of wipes!
To lend a helping hand, we've wangled a wallet-friendly deal with cashback site TopCashback to get Mirror Readers 12 packs of Huggies baby wipes for FREE - including delivery.
The 12 pack of Huggies wipes are currently on sale at Mothercare for just £8 but if you also select £3.95 standard delivery, TopCashback will give you back the full £11.95.
To claim yours, just follow the three simple steps below. The deal will end on the 19th February.
Read More How much does it cost to have a baby? Top hacks to help you save money when pregnant How to claim your free wipes Sign up to TopCashback here , for free. Purchase your £8 multi-pack via this link then select standard delivery at the checkout. You'll receive your cashback after 7 days, which will then become payable to transfer into bank accounts approximately 14 days after the order date. Wipes are always useful to have on hand - stock up with this deal Read More Boots discount code deals: The Boots mother and baby sale is now on with huge discounts on essentials like nappies and sterilisers What's the small print? This offer is only available for new members with no previous purchases or cashback through TopCashback. The offer will be valid until 23.59 on the 19th February 2017, or until 5000 claims have been made. Standard delivery will be covered if you spend £8 or less. If an order is more than £11.95 (including delivery), members will receive a maximum of £11.95 cashback. If you spend less than £11.95 you'll receive 100% cashback up to £11.95. E.g. Spend £5.99 and you'll only receive £5.99 cashback and so on. See the full terms and conditions here .
